categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic battalions

nodes.text: Jedi Master Depa Billaba led a battalion at some point during the Clone Wars. During a battle on the Mid Rim planet Haruun Kal the battalion suffered 90 percent casualties at the hands of General Grievous. Only four troopers of the battalion remained, Clone Commander "Grey," Clone Captain "Styles," Clone Sergeant "Soot," and Clone Corporal "Big-Mouth."
